review: I ordered this before it came out, and didn't try using it until I bought a new "smart" TV today. I spent a very frustrating 30 minutes trying to use the built-in wi-fi on the TV to stream video from Prime and Netflix, then got disgusted and got out my Fire TV Stick. I plugged it in and was using it within minutes. It's fun and easy to use. Highly recommended.
